commit.message:
pt.c (reduce_template_parm_level): Set DECL_ARTIFICIAL and DECL_TEMPLATE_PARM_P.

	* pt.c (reduce_template_parm_level): Set DECL_ARTIFICIAL and
	DECL_TEMPLATE_PARM_P.

	* g++.old-deja/g++.pt/ttp64.C: New test.

From-SVN: r38300
